Latest Issue

Small Sur

Small Sur is a Baltimore-bred folk-peace group spearheaded by songwriter Bob Keal. Keal, who left the South Dakota farm he was raised on at 14, spent time in California before landing in Maryland. Backed by a rotating cast of talented multi-instrumentalists, Keal’s soothing vocals are met with minimalist arrangements allowing the listener to simply ‘be’.

Subscriptions

Every quarter we release a 45 single* featuring an exclusive track for the club along with a B-Side containing an interview with the artist. All paired with a digital journal containing written features, photo, video, and more available right here.

Subscriptions Include:

All four releases from 2014, custom 45 box, Singles Club Pin, 45 adapter, digital download of each single.
